dmca.title: AccuPunch at Domain Holder
dmca.body:
I am writing in my capacity as Assistant General Counsel of AccuWeather, Inc. ("AccuWeather"), of State College, Pennsylvania.  AccuWeather offers weather forecasting services, weather related services, and weather related products, as well as many other goods, services and other products to a variety of customers on a nationwide basis.  AccuWeather is also the owner of the U.S. Trademark Registration Number 1,645,614 for the trademark "Total Weather" and design. 

It has come to our attention that your organization is using AccuWeather's trademark as your domain name.  We believe that your use of www.totalweather.com  as a domain name is a direct violation of the trademark rights owned by AccuWeather, and is in violation of the Lanham Act.   

Given your violation of various federal laws mentioned above, AccuWeather asks that you:
1.	Immediately cease and desist from any and all further use of the term
